segments.text: What's the matter with you , Mary ? You look a bit pale .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid I've got a terrible cold . What should I do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but I'm not feeling very better now . Actually I'm feeling even worse .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if I were you , I'd go to see the doctor . That might help . And you'd better stay in bed today instead of going to work .
segments.speaker: S1
